page.title: 19SPORT IN PILLEY & BOLDRE
page.content: The Forest is ideal for fiding and walking in and there are football teams in Pilley/Boldre & S.Baddesley. Cricket is also played in S.Baddesley. The pride of Boldre however is the Tug of War Team.Pulling has enjoyed a good following in the area for years but in 1977 the Team joined the AAA and in 2 years were Hampshire Champions.They have won the Solent Training League, the Wessex Area Championships,the Intercounty and National Championships and the World Cup <Sports not in the Olympics>and are now seeded 8th in the country.They have 20 pulling members from 17-45 years old and train twice a week all year and 6 times a week in the season.They expect to win about 50 awards and travel about 3000 miles a year.They always draw an enthusiastic crowd and will pull for charity when they can.
